title: Best of the Program | Guests: Tzvi Waldman & Carol Roth | 9/14/22
description:
Jewish Gun Club founder Tzvi Waldman exposes the dangers Jewish people will face as New York City is making it harder to defend themselves while worshiping. Former investment banker Carol Roth breaks down the abysmal Consumer Price Index numbers and the economy's current downward spiral. Glenn talks about the nonstop coverage of the location of the queen's remains with a special guest.
